scripts.build: tondev sol compile TokenWalletDeployer.sol && tondev sol compile TokenRoot.sol && tondev sol compile TokenWallet.sol
scripts.wrapjs: tondev js wrap TokenWalletDeployer.abi.json && tondev js wrap TokenRoot.abi.json && tondev js wrap TokenWallet.abi.json
scripts.test: npm run build && npm run wrapjs && node test.js
